showImage

public void showImage(org.eclipse.swt.graphics.ImageData data)
Shows the given image data on the internal Canvas. It internally uses some sort of thread-synchronization to avoid errors.

Parameters:
data - the image to be shown, or null to clear the display
See Also:
Display.syncExec(Runnable)

handleImageDisplay

public void handleImageDisplay(org.eclipse.swt.graphics.ImageData data)
Shows the given image data on the internal Canvas. You should prefer showImage(org.eclipse.swt.graphics.ImageData) to avoid thread-synchronisation errors.

Parameters:
data - the image to be shown, or null to clear the display
See Also:
showImage(org.eclipse.swt.graphics.ImageData)
